title: Used Equipment Strategy: Johnson Tractor 2012 Dealership of the Year

tasks.task: Run a used equipment auction for a farm equipment dealership.
subtasks: Determine the date for the annual auction.
Advertise the auction through weekly statewide ads.

Handle cash transactions at the auction.
Analyze market values for used equipment.
